title: Shit
body: Go to the bathroom, comeback my team remakes with a vote of 2-2 it wins some fucking how I lose my series and get a 20 min queue. Lmfao honestly ridiculous shit fucking game.

replies.body: If you are in the bathroom long enough to remake then the remake was justified.

Thats why you do your buisness before a game starts not after it does.

You would have had to have been AFK from the start for a total of 3(or maybe 5) minutes for the remake system to kick in. Thats quite a long time to be gone, like 2 to 3 minion waves gone and puts your team at a disadvantage already. The enemy jungler could have also cleared your side of the jungle in that time, leaving you with nothing.

Its not just about you all the time, its about your team as well.
